title: Serene Vector
description: Un style d'illustration vectorielle numérique raffiné, caractérisé par un design plat sans contours, une simplification géométrique et une palette pastel apaisante et désaturée. Il utilise des bords nets et propres associés à des rayons de lumière diagonaux doux et semi-transparents pour créer de la profondeur et une atmosphère moderne et calme, rappelant l'art des interfaces technologiques haut de gamme.
description_en: A refined digital vector illustration style characterized by lineless flat design, geometric simplification, and a soothing, desaturated pastel palette. It utilizes sharp, clean edges paired with soft, semi-transparent diagonal light shafts to create depth and a calm, modern atmosphere reminiscent of high-end tech interface art and 'Flat Design 2.0'.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration vectorielle numérique raffiné, caractérisé par un design plat sans contours, une simplification géométrique et une palette pastel apaisante et désaturée. Il utilise des bords nets et propres associés à des rayons de lumière diagonaux doux et semi-transparents pour créer de la profondeur et une atmosphère moderne et calme, rappelant l'art des interfaces technologiques haut de gamme.
prompt: A pristine digital vector illustration rendered in a sophisticated Flat Design 2.0 aesthetic, characterized by razor-sharp geometric precision, mathematical Bézier curves, and a complete absence of raster noise or texture. The rendering technique mimics the clean path-based tools of Adobe Illustrator, where {{subject}} is constructed entirely from solid shapes and color blocking without any black outlines or stroke weight. The visual language borrows from modern tech illustration and 'Corporate Memphis' styles, prioritizing simplified anatomy, smooth contours, and a sense of universal accessibility. The composition is lit by stylized, architectural lighting: distinct diagonal shafts of light (god rays) composed of white geometric shapes at 15-20% opacity cut across the scene, simulating a soft, diffused window source. These light beams interact with the underlying flat colors to create lighter tints, while shadows are rendered as hard-edged, semi-transparent polygons in a multiply blending mode, anchoring objects with precise, angular footprints. The color palette is strictly controlled, desaturated, and high-key, dominated by {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, utilizing analogous harmonies to maintain a calm, 'hygge' atmosphere. There is no texture, grit, or brushwork; every surface appears smooth, matte, and synthetic, similar to high-quality vinyl or vector graphics. The subject fills the frame completely, integrated into a minimal, orderly environment that reflects a mood of {{mood}} and digital wellness. The spatial dynamics are stable and planar, with depth implied through the layering of foreground, midground, and background shapes rather than perspective convergence. The lighting suggests a quiet morning, with a soft, diffused glow illuminating the {{primary_color}} surfaces. Full bleed, no border, no frame.
